=== Ubuntu Notes ===
===== get rid of the annoying system beep =====

vim /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist

And then add:

blacklist pcspkr

===== Docky =====
for Docky to appear correctly compositing needs to be enabled.  To do this run the following command

gconftool-2 -s --type bool /apps/metacity/general/compositing_manager true
